roleset.name: become like a fungus
roleset.note: FUNGATE-V NOTES: *beware adjectival usage and DO NOT TAG them* e.g. fungating lesion/mass/wound (from fungate.01-v)

example.name: Arg1
example.text: The wounds from the primary skin tumor fungated, becoming malodorous and quite painful.
example.arg: The wounds from the primary skin tumor

roleset.name: spontaneously grow fungus
roleset.note: FUNGUS-V NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.

example.name: fungus-v
example.text: Another problem is that sometimes bad eggs will fungus and the fungus will spread out and kill all the eggs .
